diff_hunk:
@@ -62,8 +62,13 @@ extern PyObject *THPVariableClass;
 PyObject * THPVariable_NewVolatile(PyObject *data);
 PyObject * THPVariable_New(PyObject *data, PyObject *creator, char requires_grad);
 
-#define THPVariable_Check(obj)                                                 \
+#define THPVariable_Check(obj)                                                \
     (THPVariableClass &&                                                       \
      PyObject_IsInstance(obj, THPVariableClass))
 
+#define THPVariable_CheckType(obj, func)                                            \
+    (THPVariableClass &&                                                       \
+     (PyObject_IsInstance(obj, THPVariableClass) &&                            \
+        func(PyObject_GetAttrString(obj, "data"))))
body: At this point you can safely cast obj to `THPVariableClass` and use the C member to access the data.
body_html: At this point you can safely cast obj to THPVariableClass and use the C member to access the data.
body_text: At this point you can safely cast obj to THPVariableClass and use the C member to access the data.
